pick_team_name: Pick your group and decide on a team name to start the trail
event_not_running: This event isn't currently running, come back later!
join_team_qr: Join :name by scanning the QR code below with your phone.
photo_too_big: The photo you tried to upload is too big (maximum size is 12MB)
broadcast_message: Instantly send a message to teams - use with care, and check your message for mistakes!
delete_team_check: Are you sure you want to delete team :team? This will delete all submissions associated with it.
delete_question_check: Are you sure you want to delete question :question? This will also delete all submissions associated with it.
delete_challenge_check: Are you sure you want to delete challenge :challenge? This will also delete all submissions associated with it.
delete_group_check: Are you sure you want to delete group :group? This will delete all teams (and all submissions) associated with it.
delete_event_check: Are you sure you want to delete event :event?
delete_event_outcome: This will delete all questions, challenges, groups, teams, and their submissions. Please make sure you want to do this!
change_active_check: Are you sure you want to make :event the active event?
change_active_outcome: This will end the currently running event, any teams currently participating will be locked out of the event.
stop_event_check: Are you sure you want to stop running :event?
stop_event_outcome: This will end the event, any teams currently participating will be locked out.
start_event_check: Are you sure you want to start running :event?
no_users: No users - if you're seeing this you must be the root user, congratulations!
delete_user_check: Are you sure you want to delete user :username?
